Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), haskell-devscripts-minimal | haskell-devscripts (>= 0.16.42), dh-sequence-haskell, ghc, ghc-prof, libghc-doclayout-dev, libghc-doclayout-prof, libghc-tasty-dev, libghc-tasty-prof, libghc-tasty-hunit-dev, libghc-tasty-hunit-prof, libghc-tasty-quickcheck-dev, libghc-tasty-quickcheck-prof
Description: Parser and renderer for djot light markup syntax Djot is a light markup language. This package provides a data structure to represent djot documents, a very fast parser, and functions to render a parsed document as HTML and as djot.
Package-List: libghc-djot-dev deb haskell optional arch=any libghc-djot-doc deb doc optional arch=all libghc-djot-prof deb haskell optional arch=any
